result.content:
Простая реализация

Сложность: O(sqrt(N)))

vector<int> factorize(int x) {

    vector<int> factors;
 
    for (int i = 2; i * 1ll * i <= x; ++i) {
        while (x % i == 0) {
            factors.push_back(i);
            x /= i;
        }
    }

    if (x != 1) factors.push_back(x);
    return factors;
}
